ConnectionString.description: Gets or sets the connection string of the NATS cluster to connect to.

DisableHealthChecks.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the NATS health check is disabled or not.

DisableTracing.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the OpenTelemetry tracing is disabled or not.

Net.description: Provides the client configuration settings for connecting to a NATS cluster.
